title: His Runaway Valentine
description: WillowWhile looking for a place to lie low after her father’s arrest, Willow found more than she could have hoped for in a new town.For the first time, she has a home of her own, a job, and a best friend. Now, all Willow wants to do is help her friend, Nora, recover from her recent heartbreak by celebrating Anti-Valentine’s Day at Fine Taste, the coffee shop where they work. The only problem is Nora’s brother and shop’s owner, Rowan Preston. He puts the break on their anti-love plans, but Willow is determined to make him change his mind. In fact, she’ll do anything to convince him, even if it means putting her own heart on the line. But just as things are starting to heat up, Willow’s past rears its ugly head, and this time, she could lose everything.RowanRowan is all too familiar with his little sister’s crazy antics.But when he learns of Nora’s latest hairbrained idea, Anti-Valentine’s Day, he’s more than a little irritated and immediately heads to Fine Taste to demand she give up her plans. However, when he enters the shop, he’s stopped in his tracks by the angelic beauty behind the counter. He’s even more enthralled when that same angel shows up at his office the following day, begging him to change his mind. But Willow has secrets, and danger is right around the corner. Can Rowan save Willow from the past that’s haunting her? Hot. Steamy. Satisfying. Always happily ever after guaranteed!
author: Cassi Hart
